speech:
If you're a student or employee, you can download the software for free!

From the computer you'd like to install the software, login to myCentury using your Star ID information and click on the OneDrive tile on the home page.

Login to myCentury using your Star ID information and click on the OneDrive tile on the home page.

Click on the Install Office 2016 button. 

A Microsoft set up file will begin to download on your computer. A window with installation instructions will appear on your screen. The installation package will be downloaded to your machine, and you will be prompted to run and install the package. Follow the rest of the installation instructions in the window.


For more information, check out this video: https://mediaspace.minnstate.edu/media/Students+-+6+-+Free+and+Reduced+SW.mp4/0_vagvp7ug

It's not too complicated but more than this computer can deal with. Go to this page for detailed instruction (and yes, it is free for Century employees and registered students): http://century.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/558
